bill.summary:
American Neighborhoods Protection Act of 2023
This bill imposes an excise tax, with certain exclusions, on individuals who own more than 75 single family homes. The amount of such tax is the product of $10,000 and the excess of the number of homes owned over 75.
The bill establishes a Housing Trust Fund into which the excise tax amounts shall be deposited and used to provide grants for down payment assistance to families purchasing a home.
